newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0810 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Up 0.100 to off 0.100 cent. Look ovrbought but live stronger and technicals point higher.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady to up 0.200 cent. Higher index, tight supplies, and corn futures called lower.
LEAN HOGS - Steady to up 0.100 cent. Mostly steady live, higher pork cutout, and hot and humid spell ahead.
PORK BELLIES - Steady to up 0.250 cent. Carryover from limit, strong stopper of deliveries and steadier product.
